verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: a time and place for his meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un has been set and will be announced soon] .
President Donald Trump says a time and place for his meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un [V: has] been set and will be announced soon .
President Donald Trump says a time and place for his meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un has [V: been] set and will be announced soon .
President Donald Trump says [ARG1: a time and place for his meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] has been [V: set] and will be announced soon .
President Donald Trump says a time and place for his meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un has been set and [V: will] be announced soon .
President Donald Trump says a time and place for his meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un has been set and will [V: be] announced soon .
President Donald Trump says [ARG1: a time and place for his meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] has been set and [ARGM-MOD: will] be [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: soon] .
